content: the prisma hat is worked top down in rounds until the cuff then the cuff is worked in row directly into the hat edge the rainbow colors pop against the solid white or gray really beautiful i think they would look great combined with black also or maybe a marine blue anyway you can chose the colors of your choice and combine them as you wish you will surely enjoy crocheting this hat it works up pretty quick only the knit- look crochet cuff will require a bit more time but i think it is worth it it is really pretty **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 2 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 3 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 4 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 3 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 4 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/
